t: El Paso's Helen of Troy buying fast-growing Olive & June nail-care brand for $240M
s: November 26, 2024 - El Paso’s Helen of Troy has agreed to buy fast-growing, 11-year-old nail-care products company Olive & June for $240 million. t: Helen of Troy Sells Mass Personal Care Business
s: March 9, 2022 - Helen of Troy Limited sold its mass-market Personal Care business, not including the Latin America and Caribbean regions, to HRB Brands LLC, a privately held company that is one of the largest independent branded personal care companies in North America, for $44.7 million in cash.
